description: This file implements the basic container object functions for the Sys Setup Manager Object, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization functions. It is part of the system environment for managing setup components, likely involved in system configuration or setup processes.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysSmoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Sys Setup Manager Object, setting up its member variables and function pointers based on provided container and owner contexts.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysSmoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the Sys Setup Manager Object and frees associated resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysSmoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls all required sub-objects and interfaces for the Sys Setup Manager, including setting up the RCM interface.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysSmoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the Sys Setup Manager Object, setting all properties and function pointers to default or specified values, preparing the object for use.
